languages.text: {n}Рука бродяги дергается куда-то под лохмотья, но замирает — вы слишком быстры. Ладони медленно опускаются к ногам мутанта, ослабляют шнуровку. Спустя пару мгновений вы вновь становитесь горд{mf|ым|ой} обладател{mf|ем|ьницей} пары ботинок.{/n} "Ну ты и {mf|жлоб|стерва}".

{n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."
languages.original_text: {n}Рука бродяги дергается куда-то под лохмотья, но замирает — вы слишком быстры. Ладони медленно опускаются к ногам мутанта, ослабляют шнуровку. Спустя пару мгновений вы вновь становитесь горд{mf|ым|ой} обладател{mf|ем|ьницей} пары ботинок.{/n} "Ну ты и {mf|жлоб|стерва}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches for his feet and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you once more become a proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

{n}The vagabond's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches for his feet and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you once more become a proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

{n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes, and you are too quick. He slowly reaches for his feet and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you once more become a proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

{n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes, and you are too quick. He slowly reaches for his feet and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you once more become a proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

{n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

{n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

languages.text: {n}乞食はボロ布の下に隠された何かを取ろうと手を伸ばし、そして固まる。あなたの動きがあまりに速かったせいだ。彼はゆっくりと足に手を伸ばし、靴紐を緩める。まもなくあなたは、再び自慢のブーツの持ち主となった。{/n}「貪欲なゲス野郎だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食はボロ布の下に隠された何かを取ろうと手を伸ばし、そして固まる。あなたの動きがあまりに速かったせいだ。彼はゆっくりと足に手を伸ばし、靴紐を緩める。まもなくあなたは、再び自慢のブーツの持ち主となった。{/n}「貪欲なゲス野郎だ」

languages.text: {n}乞丐的手伸向了破衣服下面的什么东西，随后停在了那里，因为你的动作太快了。他慢慢地将双手伸向了脚，解开靴子的鞋带。又过了一会儿，那双靴子再次回到了你的手中。{/n}“你这个贪婪的混蛋。”
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐的手伸向了破衣服下面的什么东西，随后停在了那里，因为你的动作太快了。他慢慢地将双手伸向了脚，解开靴子的鞋带。又过了一会儿，那双靴子再次回到了你的手中。{/n}“你这个贪婪的混蛋。”

languages.text: {n}La mano del mendigo va directa hacia algo oculto bajo sus harapos, pero se detiene: eres demasiado rápid{mf|o|a}. Baja la mano lentamente y se afloja los cordones. Momentos después, vuelves a ser {mf|el|la} propietari{mf|o|a} de un par de botas.{/n} «Escoria avarienta».
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mano del mendigo va directa hacia algo oculto bajo sus harapos, se congela y eres demasiado rápid{mf|o|a}. Se lleva la mano a los pies lentamente y se afloja los cordones. Momentos después, vuelves a ser {mf|el|la} propietari{mf|o|a} de un par de botas.{/n} «A quien la codicia gobierna nada le dura».

languages.text: {n}Die Hand des Bettlers greift nach etwas unter seinen Lumpen, erstarrt dann aber ... du bist zu schnell. Er greift langsam nach unten und löst die Schnürsenkel. Einige Augenblicke später bist du wieder {mf|stolzer Besitzer|stolze Besitzerin} deiner Stiefel.{/n} "Gieriger kleiner Drecksack."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Hand des Bettlers greift nach etwas, was unter seinen Lumpen versteckt ist, erstarrt dann aber, und du bist zu schnell. Er greift langsam zu seinen Füßen hinab und löst die Schnürsenkel. Einige Augenblicke später bist du wieder {mf|stolzer Besitzer|stolze Besitzerin} deiner Stiefel.{/n} "Gieriger kleiner Drecksack."

languages.text: {n}D'un geste vif, le mendiant tente d'extirper quelque chose de sous ses haillons, mais vous êtes bien plus rapide, et il n'a d'autre choix que de se figer. Lentement, précautionneusement, il se penche pour défaire ses lacets, et quelques instants plus tard, vous êtes de nouveau l'{mf|heureux|heureuse} propriétaire d'une paire de bottes.{/n} « Espèce d'ordure. »
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mendiant fait un geste vif pour tenter d'extirper quelque chose de sous ses haillons, mais vous êtes bien plus rapide, et il n'a pas d'autre choix que de se figer. Lentement, précautionneusement, il se penche pour défaire ses lacets, et quelques secondes plus tard, vous êtes (de nouveau) l'{mf|heureux|heureuse} propriétaire d'une paire de bottes.{/n} « Espèce d'ordure. »

languages.text: {n}Dilencinin eli, üzerine sarındığı bezlerin altında gizlediği bir şeye doğru uzanıyor ve donup kalıyor. Sen daha hızlısın. Yavaşça eğilip bağcıkları gevşetiyor. Birkaç dakika sonra botların gururlu sahibi yeniden sen oluyorsun.{/n} "Açgözlü şerefsiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar's hand lunges for something hidden under his rags, then freezes — you are too quick. He slowly reaches down and loosens the laces. A few moments later, you are once more the proud owner of a pair of boots.{/n} "Greedy little sleazebag."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilencinin eli, üzerine sarındığı bezlerin altında gizlediği bir şeye doğru uzanıyor ve donup kalıyor. Sen daha hızlısın. Yavaşça eğilip bağcıkları gevşetiyor. Birkaç dakika sonra botların gururlu sahibi yeniden sen oluyorsun.{/n} "Açgözlü şerefsiz."
